id: Duties and Obligations of Data Fiduciaries
title: Duties and Obligations of Data Fiduciaries
description: Under the Digital Personal Data Protection Act (DPDPA), 2023, every organization or government body that decides how and why personal data is processed is called a Data Fiduciary. The Act places clear responsibilities on Data Fiduciaries to ensure that they handle data lawfully, fairly, and with respect for individualsâ€™ privacy. These duties are not optional; they are legal requirements that apply to all entities handling personal data.
